TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlILIndex extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Manages nodes from an input document, indexed by key value(s). This class is used as a cache of nodes indexed by `xsl:key` instructions and allows fast access to these nodes.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Add (string key, System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator navigator);
.method public hidebysig instance void Add(string key, class System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator navigator) cil managed

Docs.summary: Adds a node that is indexed by the specified key value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlQueryNodeSequence Lookup(string key) cil managed

Docs.summary: Looks up a sequence of nodes that are indexed by the specified key value.
Docs.returns: A sequence of nodes that are indexed by the specified key value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If there are no nodes associated with the key, this method returns a non-null empty sequence.
